headline: EPAM Systems, Inc. (EPAM): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on EPAM Systems, Inc. on Investing with Common Sense’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on EPAM. EPAM Systems, Inc.’s share was trading at $218.04 as of January 27th. EPAM’s trailing and forward P/E were 33.65 and 18.98, respectively according to Yahoo Finance.
